DrugName: Pain medication (e.g., oxycodone or hydrocodone) as needed for pain management
Oral anti-coagulant (e.g., rivaroxaban or apixaban) to prevent further thromboembolism in CLL patients
Opioid (e.g., morphine or fentanyl) with caution and monitoring for respiratory depression, especially considering the patient's arthritis and legal blindness
Pneumococcal vaccine (PPSV23) to prevent pneumococcal infections given his immunocompromised state due to CLL
